Publications

  1. D. Densmore, T. H.C. Hsiau, J. Kittleson, W. DeLoache, C. Batten, and J. C. Anderson (May 2010): “Algorithms for Automated DNA Assembly,” Nucleic Acids Research, vol. 38, no. 8, pp. 2607-2616.
  2. D. Densmore, J. Kittleson, L. Bilitchenko, A. Liu, and J. C. Anderson (May 2010): “Rule Based Constraints for the Construction of Genetic Devices,” IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems, Paris, France.

  4. D. Densmore, R. Passerone, and A. Sangiovanni-Vincentelli (September/October 2006): “A Platform-Based Taxonomy for ESL Design,” IEEE Design and Test of Computers, vol. 23, no. 5, pp. 359-374.
